text: -nA$M minOti brahmaqvani#M tvA kShatraqvaniqmityA#ha yathAyaqjurEqvaitad GRuqtEna# dyAvApRuthivIq A pRu#NEthAqmityaudu#baMryAM juhOtiq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI Eqva rasE#nAnaktyAq-ntamaqnva-va#srAvayatyAqntamEqva yaja#mAnaqM tEja#sA-naktyaiqndramaqsIti# Caqdiradhiq ni da#dhAtyaiqndra(gm) hi dEqvata#yAq sadO# viSvajaqnasya# CAqyEtyA#ha viSvajaqnasyaq hyE#ShA CAqyA yath sadOq nava#Cadiq- [  ] 53
